answers.answer: Some drs do them at every appt. but most if the time you only get two ultrasounds unless they're worried about growth.

Every place Is different. Here In Arizona, In the city that I live In, they only give you one u/s at 20 weeks for the anatomy scan, unless you are high risk or they see somethin' wrong during that scan. They possibly might give you another one close to your due date If somethin' Is wrong when they check you or they can't hear the heartbeat.
Ive gotten an ultrasound every visit well at least the three times ive gone..i gues its just diff.
